channel.title: aloe_heights on Wilderness Bushcamp
channel.description: Recent content in aloe_heights on Wilderness Bushcamp

item.title: Aloe Studio
item.description: This cosy studio apartment is located near the main house so is the perfect choice for someone who wants to have convenient access and be a little less “in the bush” but still be able to enjoy a private deck with far reaching ocean views.

item.title: Aloe Suite
item.description: A private gateway leads to this spacious and comfortable self-catering suite, which is attached to the main house but enjoys total privacy.
